title: Customer Cancels a Subscription
description: A customer logs into their account to cancel their monthly subscription box.

tasks.description: Log into their online account and navigate to the 'Manage Subscription' page.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer finds their active subscription details.

tasks.description: Select the 'Cancel Subscription' option and provide a reason for cancellation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer chooses to cancel and provides feedback.

tasks.description: Receive an on-screen confirmation and an email confirming the subscription has been cancelled.
tasks.expected_outcome: The subscription is successfully cancelled, and the customer is notified.
